title: I want to be chat restricted.
body:
I'm a human being able to admit my shortcomings and I really can't stand but not get upset at some of these people many of whom I question whether they have a pulse let alone be able to live functioning lives in society which is infinitely more complex than League is.  

I want chat restriction on my account all the time.  For the sake of me and my teammates.  How do I do this.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=nm1010,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZyAd94BI,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-31T23:00:25.964+0000)
>
> Remove your enter key.

I like it!

Type 

/mute all 

at the beginning of each game. You won't hear anything and you won't be able to say anything.
You know muting doesn't stop other people from seeing what you type, correct?
I didn't actually. Either way though, he would have no provocation to type and even if he did, he won't get flamed back.

the problem isn't what they are saying. the problem is the plays they make. Like watching a vayne Tower dive 4 people by herself 1v4 and questioning why she died. Or a Lux stays in Mid lane with 20 hp and a WW on the enemy team.
i try to explain this to people all the time. it's the same as if you mute the volume on your tv, it doesn't stop you from talking and moving around etc.

just type /mute all

it mutes your messages to them as well
